name: 3dFWHMx
author: AFNI Developers
description: Compute Full Width at Half Maximum (FWHM) for FMRI datasets using AutoCorrelation Function (ACF)

inputs.description: Use only voxels that are nonzero in dataset 'mmm'
inputs.name: Mask file

inputs.description: Compute a mask from THIS dataset
inputs.name: Automask flag

inputs.description: if the input dataset has more than one sub-brick then subtract the median of each voxel's time series before processing FWHM
inputs.name: Demethod flag

inputs.description: Normalize each voxel's time series to have the same MAD before processing FWHM, implies -demed
inputs.name: Uniform normalization flag

inputs.description: Detrend to order 'q'. If q is not given, the program picks q=NT/30; -detrend disables -demed, and includes -unif
inputs.name: Detrending order

inputs.description: Save the detrended file into a dataset with prefix 'd'
inputs.name: Detrended file prefix

inputs.description: Compute the final estimate as the geometric mean
inputs.name: Geometric mean flag

inputs.description: Compute the final estimate as the arithmetic mean
inputs.name: Arithmetic mean flag

inputs.description: Combine the final measurements along each axis into one result
inputs.name: Combine flag

inputs.description: Write output to file 'ttt' (3 columns of numbers). If not given, the sub-brick outputs are not written. Use '-out -' to write to stdout, if desired
inputs.name: Output file

inputs.description: Compute the spatial autocorrelation of the data as a function of radius, then fit that to a model and output the model parameters
inputs.name: ACF parameter
